cut from the mold of the antisocial

verse 1
what is your target
what is your reason
do you have emotions is your heart freezing
seizing this opportunity to speak
you didnt say nothin but turn your fucking cheek

dead cell
dead cell

verse 2

learn a lesson from the almighty dread
jah mighty warrior nothings scarier
kids are getting sick like malaria
situation gets hairier im throwing up all types of barriers im telling ya
the kids are getting singled out
let me hear the dead cells shout
